original_text: And I made a decree, and search has been made, and it has been found that this city from of old has risen against kings, and that rebellion and sedition have been made in it.
korean_text: 명령하여 살펴보니 과연 이 성읍이 예로부터 왕들을 거역하며 그 중에서 항상 패역하고 반역하는 일을 행하였으며

sentences.original_text: that this city from of old has risen against kings
sentences.korean_translation: 이 성은 예로부터 왕들을 거스려 반역해 왔으며

sentences.original_text: and that rebellion and sedition have been made in it
